text: Join us this #Friday, 6/29 @ 12pm for our upcoming #Lunch & #Learn, presented by Dr. Stuart Silverman at @UCLAHealth. Learn about the history & #science of #cannabis, potential applications for #cancer, & how to #support cannabis #research. RSVP Required: https://t.co/hxfP63EGge https://t.co/Z5eaDa4m6S
